articles.description: Steven Whitley had 16 points, nine rebounds and seven assists Monday night and No. 5 seed Norfolk State beat 12th-seeded Maryland-Eastern Shore 78-68 in the first round of the Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference Tournament.
articles.headline: Norfolk State beats Maryland-Eastern Shore 78-68

articles.description: Matt Mooney scored 20 points on 8-of-10 shooting to help No. 2 seed South Dakota beat third-seeded Denver 76-58 on Monday night in the Summit League Tournament semifinals.
articles.headline: Mooney, S. Dakota beat Denver, advance to Summit title game

articles.description: Freshman Loudon Love scored 18 points and grabbed 12 rebounds -- his 13th double-double -- to help second-seeded Wright State beat No. 6 seed Milwaukee 59-53 in the Horizon League Tournament semifinals on Monday night.
articles.headline: Love, Wright St. beat Milwaukee in Horizon League semifinals

articles.description: Jordy Kuiper and Demetrius Troy each scored 13 points, and UNC Greensboro pulled away from East Tennessee State to win the Southern Conference championship 62-47 on Monday night and earn its first NCAA Tournament berth since 2001.
articles.headline: UNC Greensboro smothers ETSU to win SoCon title 62-47

images.caption: It was a close game until late in the second half for East Tennessee State vs UNC Greensboro, until UNCG pulled away and won 62-47 to punch a ticket into the NCAA tournament.
images.name: UNC Greensboro wins Southern tournament
